document.masterDocTitle: Additions to the knowledge of the genus Lyroda Say (Hymenoptera: Crabronidae) from India with the descriptions of two new species

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Morphota formosa
Smith, 1858: 17
, ♀ . Holotype or syntypes : ♀ , Indonesia : Sulawesi : no specific locality (NHM).

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution . India : Arunachal Pradesh , Delhi ( new record ), Karnataka , Kerala , Meghalaya , Sikkim , Tamil Nadu ( new record ), Tripura ( new record ), Uttarakhand ( new record ), Uttar Pradesh , West Bengal . Elsewhere : Bangladesh ; Cambodia ; China ; Indonesia ; Laos ; Myanmar ; Oman ; Philippines ; Solomon Islands ; Thailand ; Vietnam ( Pulawski 2021 ; Schmid-Egger & Al-Jahdhami 2021 ).
